Fairness: The winning numbers are random and not known in advance. Random Number Generator based  on TRON hash block and operated by smart contract in TRON.network You can use Player's Address and Block Number to check winning numbers.

Get rewarded just by referring your friends! Enjoy lifetime rewards just by referring your friends! Receive 0.2% of all their winnings. All rewards are sent out automatically through our smart contracts. Just copy the link above and share it to all your friends!
1. Make sure you have a TRONLink wallet. For more information on how to create one, click here.
2. To play you must own TRX, the underlying cryptocurrency that powers the TRON network.
3. Set your BET AMOUNT. This is the amount of TRX you will be betting.
5. Click SPIN to place your bet. The smart contracts will then randomly generate a sector number.
6. If the sector number is equal your prediction then you WIN! Payout = BET AMOUNT * SECTOR.
Still have questions? Join our telegram group and we'll be more than happy to help!
